title: Update displayed wallet balance from $0.00 to $15.00

requirements.text: Update the Wallet page so the displayed user balance amount shown in the “Available Balance” card changes from "$0.00" to "$15.00" for the user/account identifier "mzmds-idwio-g2zsr-4dzef-bqy4l-hkopr-jkddk-spzk4-utlyx-oqjxf-kae".

quotes:
mzmds-idwio-g2zsr-4dzef-bqy4l-hkopr-jkddk-spzk4-utlyx-oqjxf-kae 
Change  this is user balance 0.00$ to 15$

acceptanceCriteria: On the Wallet page (frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx), the large balance value in the “Available Balance” card no longer displays “$0.00”.
The displayed balance for the specified user/account identifier reads “$15.00” (USD formatting with two decimals).
No other wallet UI text is changed, and all user-facing text remains in English.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI components are read-only).
Do not edit any immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; only add a migration if state upgrades are required (not required for a pure UI text change).
nonGoals: Implementing real wallet accounting (deposits/withdrawals), transaction history, or backend persistence for balances.
Changing pricing section ranges or weekly return percentages (handled by existing features).
